attributes.action: to exercise his duty under International Law to exert his influence to stop Israel's violation of International Humanitarian Law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to exercise his duty under International Law to exert his influence to stop  Israel's violation of International Humanitarian Law  in Gaza by calling for intervention by the International Criminal Court. To call for the General Assembly of the Security Council to act under Article 22 of the UN Charter to call for the establishment of a Tribunal to hear allegations of War Crimes committed by Israel against civilians during their present offensive war in Gaza.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
